info.description: Semantria applies Text and Sentiment Analysis to tweets, facebook posts, surveys, reviews or enterprise content.
info.title: Semantria
paths./blacklist.{content_type}.delete.d: This method removes certain blacklisted items by their values on Semantria side.
paths./blacklist.{content_type}.delete.p: Identifier of configuration blacklist items linked to.
List of unique blacklisted item identifiers (string).
paths./blacklist.{content_type}.delete.r: Incoming request body is incorrect. Server responds with details.
Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.
Forbidden. Server responds if client tries to remove primary configuration.
Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.
paths./blacklist.{content_type}.get.desc: This method retrieves all backlisted items available on Semantria side.
paths./blacklist.{content_type}.get.para: Identifier of configuration blacklist linked to.
paths./blacklist.{content_type}.get.resp: Client request accepted and queued. Server responds with the blacklist.
Client request accepted, no blacklist found. Server responds with empty body.
Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.
Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.
paths./blacklist.{content_type}.post.des: This method adds new unique items to the backlist on Semantria side.
paths./blacklist.{content_type}.post.par: Identifier of configuration blacklist linked to.
List of parametrized JSON or XML objects.
paths./blacklist.{content_type}.post.res: Incoming request body is incorrect. Server responds with details.
Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.
Number of allowed blacklisted items per configuration achieved.
Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.

paths./blacklist.{content_type}.put.para: Identifier of configuration blacklist linked to.
List of parametrized JSON or XML objects.
paths./blacklist.{content_type}.put.resp: Incoming request body is incorrect. Server responds with details.

Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.

paths./categories.{content_type}.put.res: Incoming request body is incorrect. Server responds with details.

paths./collection.{content_type}.post.de: This method queues collection of documents onto the server for analysis. Queued collection of documents analyzes in common context as entire thing. If unique configuration ID provided, Semantria uses settings of that configuration during analysis, in opposite the primary configuration uses. Collection IDs are unique in scope of configuration. If the same ID appears twice, Semantria overrides existing collection with the new Data
paths./collection.{content_type}.post.pa: Identifier of configuration used for analysis.
paths./collection.{content_type}.post.re: Client request accepted and queued. Server responds with the sentiment-bearing phrases list.
Client request accepted and queued for processing.
Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.
Documents limit per collection is achieved.
Characters limit for single document exceeded.
Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.
paths./collection/processed.{content_typ: This method retrieves analysis results for processed collections from Semantria. FAILED collections will have FAILED status in response. Semantria responds with limited amount of results per API call. If configuration ID provided, Semantria responds with the collections, which were queued using the same configuration ID, in opposite Primary configuration uses.
Identifier of configuration used for analysis.
Client request accepted and queued. Server responds with processed collections.
Client request accepted, no processed collections found on the server.
Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.
Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.
paths./collection/{collection_id}.{conte: This method cancels collection analysis by unique ID on Semantria side if it is waiting for analysis in queue.
Identifier of configuration used for analysis.
Client request accepted. Document canceled from processing on the server.
Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.
No collections with provided ID found on server.
Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.

This method retrieves analysis results for documents collection by its unique ID or the collection’s status in queue if it did not analyzed yet. Semantria guarantees delivering of all collections back to the client even if they FAILED on Semantria side due to some reason.
Identifier of configuration used for analysis.
Client request accepted. Server responds with processed document or its status.
Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.
No collections with provided ID found on server.
Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.
Retrieve collection analysis or its status in queue

paths./document.{content_type}.post.desc: This method queues document onto the server for analysis. Queued document analyzes individually and will have its own set of results. If unique configuration ID provided, Semantria uses settings of that configuration during analysis, in opposite the primary configuration uses. Document IDs are unique in scope of configuration. If the same ID appears twice, Semantria overrides existing document with the new Data.
paths./document.{content_type}.post.para: Identifier of configuration used for analysis.
paths./document.{content_type}.post.resp: Client request accepted and queued. Server responds with the sentiment-bearing phrases list.
Client request accepted and queued for processing.
Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.
Characters limit for the document exceeded.
Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.
paths./document/batch.{content_type}.pos: This method queues batch of documents for analysis. The rules are the same as for single document mode but here the documents ordered into the batch.
Identifier of configuration used for analysis.
List of parametrized JSON or XML objects.
Client request accepted and queued. Server responds with the sentiment-bearing phrases list.
Client request accepted and queued for processing.
Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.
Request is forbidden for selected processing mode.
Documents limit per batch is achieved.
Characters limit for the document exceeded.
Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.
Queue batch of documents for analysis

paths./statistics.{content_type}.get.des: This method retrieves overall and per configuration usage statistics for specific timeframe. Statistics ordered per available configurations. Available interval values are current hour, day, week, month and year.

Hour, Day, Week, Month, Year values are supported.
